title: Chapter 1865 - Flowers Bloom On The Far Shore
body:
Chapter 1865 - Flowers Bloom On The Far Shore

About ten minutes later, Su Yi had learned everything he wanted to know. He opened the prison doors once more and sent Old Devil Star Lake’s soul body back inside.

He then sat cross-legged, took out a bottle of rare and precious Great Realm medicines, and started tending to his wounds. 

Back then, Divine Venerate Tian Huang sent his avatar of will into the Immortal Realm and worked with his divine emissaries to destroy the defensive formations of Spiritual Desolation Mountain. That’s also how he managed to kill Lin Feng’s junior apprentice brother, Sword Sovereign Dong Xuan… Su Yi sank into thought.

According to Old Devil Star Lake, after Sword Sovereign Dong Xuan perished, Divine Venerate Tian Huang acquired his Mystery of Chaos, the Realm-Demarcating Ruler.

That aside, the Divine Venerate took all of the most precious treasures of Spiritual Desolation Mountain, including incomparably rare Great Realm medicinal herbs and the tomes and Daoist canons Li Fuyou had acquired over the course of his life.

These were treasures even a god had taken a fancy to. How extraordinary must they have been?

Seeing the current state of Spiritual Desolation Mountain reminded...
original_title: Chapter 1865 - Flowers Bloom on the Far Shore
